name: DELAWARE VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER, Appellant, v. Patricia NIEHAUS
name_abbreviation: Delaware Valley Medical Center v. Niehaus

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: DELAWARE VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER, Appellant, v. Patricia NIEHAUS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Superior Court reversed. See Paul v. Lankenau Hospital, 524 Pa. 90, 569 A.2d 346 (1990).
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jonathan B. Sprague, Patrick K. McCoyd, Joseph J. McAlee, Philadelphia, for D.V.M.C.
Michael P. Kelly, Langhorne, for P. Niehaus.
casebody.head_matter:
649 A.2d 433
DELAWARE VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER, Appellant, v. Patricia NIEHAUS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1994.
Decided Nov. 4, 1994.
Jonathan B. Sprague, Patrick K. McCoyd, Joseph J. McAlee, Philadelphia, for D.V.M.C.
Michael P. Kelly, Langhorne, for P. Niehaus.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
